name: Life Simulator (Feng Pan)
description:
While clicking the buttons, all the art and sound are running inside your brain-hardware with IOS(Imagination OS), although there are only buttons and texts in this game.

Money reaches a reasonable amount(300 for Gen.1) to unlock “XXX”, if you are not too old.

You retire at the age of 60.

Learning is really useful, I hide how useful it is in numbers, just like in real-life.

When you have a child, you can teach him/her, which is also really useful. But you have to feel how the numbers work, just like in real-life.

When your child grows to 18+, you will be your next generation.

How many generations can you survive? Please reply to let me know =]
